msg: Another round of updates to libprocess, these once focus on being able to install handlers for HTTP requests and generic libprocess messages.

msg: Updates to libprocess relating to typed PIDs.

msg: Updates to libprocess to make dispatches no longer require a pointer to the process.

msg: Updated a comment and removed a line.

author: benh
msg: Updates to 'install' handlers for messages in master as well as scheduler.
